item.title: Using DISTINCT in Parent-Child¬†Relationships

class Parent(Base):
    __tablename__ = "parent"
    id: Mapped[int] = mapped_column(primary_key=True)

    childs: Mapped[List["Child"]] = relationship(back_populates="parent")


class Child(Base):

    id: Mapped[int] = mapped_column(primary_key=True)
